hadiths.text: Narrated Maimuna bint Al-Harith:My bed was beside the praying place (Musalla) of the Prophet (ﷺ) and sometimes his garment fell on me while I used to lie in my bed

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا صَلَّى إِلَى فِرَاشٍ فِيهِ حَائِضٌ
chapter.eng-name: To offer Salat (prayer) facing a bed occupied by a menstruatng woman
